alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:53AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gulf, northwestern Wakulla, central Gadsden, Liberty and central Leon Counties through 1045 AM EDT/945 AM CDT/... At 953 AM EDT/853 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Quincy to near Mexico Beach. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Doak Campbell Stadium, Orange, Wewahitchka, Lake Bradford, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Florence, Chipola Cutoff, Jamieson, Central City, Griffin Heights, Poplar Camp and Kern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
